Description:
KEY REQUIREMENTSSuccessfully completed a degree or professional qualification in marketing from a recognized institution.
MBA would be an added advantage.
Minimum 7 years of experience in international marketing with exposure to export sales operations relating to the Tyre & Rubber industry.
Excellent negotiation and presentation skills and the proficiency in different languages would be highly advantageous.
Goal oriented individual with excellent verbal and written communications skills.Job Details
